entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
